entry.title: Segregated Witness features wish list
entry.summary: On December 10, 2015, jl2012 requested information on SIGHASH_WITHINPUTVALUE proposal which is believed to make offline signing easier. The link to nhashtype proposal was provided while the benefits of OP_CODESEPARATOR were shared in a separate email regarding the summary of sighash type proposals. The email ended with Bryan's contact details.
